Text.val: 14.10.2011 SH SCR16805 Fixed bug where INVO rows were deleted instead of INUD rows
17.09.2011 GB SCR16753 Extended the A - Changes in CLIENT_COUNTRY
//05-01-2006 JP did some tests and verifies with BT(SCR10038)
//15-10-2003 JP SCR #4554 change selection of invoice rows
//14-01-2003 JP SCR #2774 extend selection in DSQL task "CCRYRead..."
-- If GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 122) and CCRY302_CONTINUOUS = Y
-- If GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 122) and CCRY302_CONTINUOUS = N

SQL_STMT_U.val: select IDUN_NO from :1/DEBH, :1/INVO, :1/IDUN, :1/DULD where INVO_ADMNO=:2 and INVO_CLNTNO=:3 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 and INVO_DEBH_NO=DEBH_NO and DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY=':4' and IDUN_NO=INVO_NO and DULD_LETTER=IDUN_DUNNLETTER and DULD_PRINTINVOICES<4
select INVO_NO from :1/INVO, :1/DEBH where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DEBH_NO=DEBH_NO and DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY=':4'
select INVO_NO from :1/DEBH, :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO=:2 and INVO_CLNTNO=:3 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 and INVO_DEBH_NO=DEBH_NO and DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY=':4'
